Description:
GET THE FAMILY FEEL
Sometimes you just get a home that you know has been enjoyed and feels like home as soon as you walk in. Well this home is just that, the owners have loved and maintained this place for the next person to make it theirs. Built with family time in mind this home offers undercover veranda directly off the kitchen meals.
Only a short distance to the things you will need for an enjoyable life in this suburb. Get the balance right between work and play. Ride your bike or walk the bike trail, visit the many restaurants and cafes. Enrol the kids into sporting groups of which there are too many to list.
What options do we have for schooling? Well we have State, Christian and Catholic schools at your fingertips. Have I convinced you to move yet? Come and check Clifton Springs out you will be surprised at what you will find. Only a stoneâ??s throw from the golf club and boat ramp and not at all far from the shopping centres.

Description:
Lifestyle Beneath The Willows
This beautifully renovated weatherboard classic sitting on 878sqm, is not a home you might expect to find in the peaceful seaside village of Clifton Springs. Perfectly placed for a leisure based lifestyle- explore coastal towns, beaches and wineries nearby, or unwind on a private deck surrounded by ancient willow trees and stunning parklands. The choice is yours!
-Refurbished from head to toe, with every modification complimenting the classic style
-Situated on a prime allotment of 878sqm, with lush green lawn spaces and privatising trees
-A unique history, the home was carefully transported from Mitcham Victoria, and lovingly restored!
-External Hamptons style colour palette of neutral tones, accented by rich terracotta tiling
-Completely renewed, with brand new fittings and fixtures internally, including all electrics
-Polished Tasmanian Oak flooring in every room, floor to ceiling ceramic tiling to wet areas
-Be surrounded by green! Leafy established trees and parkland is visible from every window
-Light and views welcomed inside with clever use of full glazed external doors at every turn
-Open living and dining is spacious and bright, connected to the outdoors by floor to ceiling windows
-Fresh white kitchen with 40mm stone benchtops, ss appliances and abundant storage
-Take the long central hallway from the main living hub that leads to the private bedroom wing
-The first of the large bedrooms is treated with a garden panorama, and a full wall of robes
-Long and wide, the second bedroom could easily accommodate a study or play zone within
-Spanning the width of the home at the rear, the Master suite enjoys the best views of the parkland
-His and Her’s WIR, luxe ensuite with double shower, and versatile parent’s retreat or nursery
-For private relaxation, a scenic deck adjoins the Master suite overlooking the reserve
-Luxurious 2.8m high ceilings, feature pendants and LED lighting amplify internal space
-Entertain with ease; the home has 3 open air decks, all blessed with parkland or landscaped views
-Take the back gate for a relaxing walk under the historic willows, following the creek’s path
-Picnic with children and explore the botanic style gardens on your back doorstep!
-Gas ducted heating, AC to main living kitchen zone, ceiling fans to each bedroom
-Double undercover carport and long driveway for guests, and convenient under home storage
-Perfectly positioned to enjoy the Bellarine Peninsula’s coastal towns, beaches and wineries
-Tucked away within a quieter paced and friendly neighbourhood unaffected by summer tourism
-Only 5’ to Drysdale or Curlewis shopping, 20’ to Geelong, and 1hr 20mins from Melbourne
-10’ to Portarlington with new ferry service to Docklands makes accessing the city a breeze!
Offering more than just a home this completely rejuvenated property delivers an idyllic lifestyle, with the benefit of allowing you more time to explore! Inspect today.

Description:
Boutique Wyndham Rise
Wyndham Rise Estate is your opportunity to secure a block that is so different to the other estates available in the 3222 growth corridor. Specifically designed to allow for wider designed homes and side access, these blocks have a frontage of in excess of 18 Meters… and with very few restrictive covenants, you can build your dream home and not the developers.
Call today to get more information.

Description:
Remodeled to perfection this home beyond any doubt makes living easy!
This fully renovated home boasts the finest quality in fixture and fittings and presents craftsmanship beyond compare. Comprising of four generous bedrooms three with BIR, the master with a generous ensuite including a double shower. The central main bathroom consists of a free-standing bath and shower. An impeccable entertainers kitchen has all the extras equipped with high-quality appliances. There is an abundance of bench and cupboard space to provide ample room for the whole family in the heart of the home. All the modern day features are embodied a wood log fire and split system air conditioning that makes living in this home a pleasure all year around. The low maintenance yard makes you feel like you're living in nirvana and is perfect for the entertainer that enjoy hosting a gathering for family and friends. Outside also contains a beautiful undercover area with spa, double garage and side access perfect for a caravan or trailer. This astounding home has all the bells and whistles and within a short distance to the Drysdale Village, The Clifton Springs Jetty there is nothing that isn't provided. Book an inspection today to secure yourself a home for the family at exceptional value.

Description:
Charming Beach Cottage, A Stone's Throw from the Water!
A stone's throw from the Clifton Springs boat ramp, this charming coastal cottage is the perfect bayside retreat. An open plan layout downstairs has a large kitchen opening onto a lounge and dining space that samples bay views. Solid stone benchtops and Miele appliances, visible timber beams, a floating timber floor and a wood fired heater are stylish touches that add plenty of character to this A Frame home. Beyond the kitchen, a large, private back yard perfect for entertaining sits alongside two large vegetable beds and leads to a self contained unit that could be an ideal rumpus room, further accommodation or income opportunity. Fitted out with a kitchenette, bathroom and its own side access, the options for this part of the property are endless.
Downstairs, two large double bedrooms have BIRs and one, currently configured as a bunk room allows for plenty of accommodation. The master suite makes up the second floor and set in the apex of the building has sweeping views of the bay, across to the You Yangs. A private balcony and lots of space for a lounge set up together with an ensuite and massive BIR makes this a complete retreat.
Minutes walk from the beach front and boat ramp, this home is set in a quiet location, yet close to all amenities. Shops and schools and the local golf course are close by and an attractive greenery garden is low maintenance making this the perfect lock up and leave coastal home.
Insights: 145 Bayshore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Position, Great Lifestyle, Great Value
High up on Thamballina Road, this well-presented 3-bedroom home ticks a lot of boxes. Great position; large block; established, low-maintenance garden; off-street parking; huge garage/work shed; easy-living interior; heating and cooling; and great value for money. An elevated drive delivers you to the covered verandah and front door. A tiled entrance foyer leads into the large, comfortable lounge, with views of the terraced front garden. Through an arch, the dining and kitchen area is enhanced by a split system which provides year-round comfort. Kitchen fittings include a Modern Maid electric stove, a Robinhood rangehood, Stirling dishwasher and a large pantry. Off the central hallway, there’s a laundry with an adjacent WC, a smart bathroom with bath, vanity and linen press, and 3 bedrooms - all with built-in robes and views of the garden. With access from the laundry, a side walkway leads to a clothesline and a north-facing open terraced patio - where cold beverages and a barbecue wouldn’t be out of place. At the top end of the drive, double gates open to the substantial garage/work shed (10m x 7m), and a fenced off area at the end of the garden. With spectacular views of the bay from surrounding streets and numerous vantage points, and just a couple of minutes drive to shops and cafes, this property could appeal to first-home buyers, investors, downsizers, and possibly tradies. It might just also be the best value buy on the Bellarine Peninsula.
Insights: 41 Thamballina Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 79-81 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Stunning Panoramic Bay Views, Close Beach & STCA options!
This impressive and exceptionally spacious 5 BR home with stunning, panoramic Port Phillip Bay views from 5 rooms sits on a double block with a beautiful rural ambience. A magnificent position very close to waterfront/beach, public transport and shops and minutes’ drive from all the delights of the Bellarine Peninsula: award winning wineries (incl. Jack Rabbit) numerous tourist beaches, boat ramp, golf course, cafes, and ferries to Melbourne and Sorrento!
The corner allotment and north-western aspect affords sweeping views across turquoise bay waters to the You Yangs and Geelong skyline. The nightlights are stunning, the sunsets sublime! Subdivision is an easy option, with the possibility of 2x2-storey townhouses with incredible bay vistas (STCA) on no. 81.
Filled with an abundance of natural light and picturesque garden views too, and consisting of 3 living zones and 2 large entertaining decks, the home provides flexible family/entertainment zones. Tasmanian Oak floors and crisp white deco is classy and fresh. The main lounge harnesses the best of the view, extending to the front balcony. The rear living zone flows out from French doors to an expansive covered entertainer’s deck, and across to a huge self-sustaining garden with herbs, mixed fruit trees and birdlife.
The large kitchen, with fantastic bay and garden views is a cook’s dream with superior Smeg appliances including a 900mm gas/electric cooker. The scenic master bedroom is adjacent to a luxurious main bathroom with spa bath and oversized shower. A 2nd shower room with toilet extends from the laundry. Ducted reverse cycle AC and ducted gas heating to ensure comfort.
Inclusions galore: 4-car garage and double carport, indoor utility storage room, 2 sheds, and a conservatory adjoining a BBQ patio, plus ample lawn and space for a boat, caravan, in-ground pool or tennis court.
An inspection is a must to fully appreciate the ambience and bay views of this quality, versatile home! Land size 1294sqm approx
Insights: 79-81 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Vogue Coastal Living!
An architecturally designed 2-storey home with a striking facade and breathtaking views capturing the natural brilliance of the You-Yangs panorama. A statement entry with a floating timber staircase and chandelier hanging from the sky-high ceiling. Urged to climb, you step into a gorgeous open plan domain set on an engineered timber floor, accented with a stunning grey & white palette. The galley kitchen is framed with a bulkhead, and showcased with elegant waterfall edged stonetop benches, and 'tip-on' handle-less, soft-close cabinetry. There is a 38-bottle wine rack, s/steel double wall oven, and a large walk-in pantry & drop-zone. The galley is flanked with an induction cooking zone, adorned with a frosted window splashback, infusing the hob with natural light. The living and dining area naturally flows to an entertainer's delight balcony, with its own joinery fit-out and beautiful glass balustrading. This upper level habitat is spoilt with a separate media room, and powder room. Tucked away is the luxury master suite, with a WIR/dressing room and an on-trend ensuite. Teenagers can retreat downstairs with their own living space, 3-bedrooms and luxury bathroom. Additional features of the abode include: LED lighting: ducted climate controlled air; gas-boosted solar HWS; rainwater tank with WC feed; double-glazing windows; stylish vertical-rout design int. doors; secure side gate access; landscaped yard, and a DLUG with dual access. A spectacular home with so much to offer for modern living. If you love the spirit of the community neighbourhood, but desire an upgrade? Or, seeking a seachange property with luxe touches? Then look no further!
Insights: 16 Sundial Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovated and Ready Now
Contemplating the move to the lovely bay side area of Clifton Springs then this affordable three bedroom, one bathroom fully renovated home is perfect. Ready to move in with recent improvements including paintwork, new floor coverings, central gas heating, security system, renovated bathroom and laundry and the list goes on. BIRs, fan to main bedroom, air conditioner to living area, under cover outdoor entertaining and new spouting all around.
The garden has been recently landscaped with beautiful new hedging, vegetable garden area and manicured lawns.
Room to park the boat or caravan on this 582m2 corner block. The single garage with remote door has an extra two metres approximately at the front for that all important work bench.
Walking distance to the Clifton Springs Golf Club, boat ramp and Central Road kindergarten. All other amenities just five minutes away in the car.
This comfortable home is perfect for young couples or retirees. Book your inspection now.

BUILD THE HOME OF YOUR DREAMS
Located in a quiet residential area of Clifton Springs, this generous allotment (732m2) is in a great location.
At your door step and just a 5 minute walk to the golf club and only a 10 min walk to the beach.
Enviable opportunity to design and build a magnificent home to capture the unobstructed views across Port Phillip Bay to the You Yangs.
This east frontage facing vacant land is ideal to raise a young family in, retire in comfort or develop an investment property that can suit a range of purposes.

Description:
FAMILY HOME BACKING ON TO RESERVE, ABSOLUTE HAVEN!
This family home sets on approx. 635 SQMs of land and has a north orientation with leafy private appeal few homes are lucky enough to enjoy. Front lounge room , second open plan area includes generous proportions with kitchen, meals and living, all opening to huge undercover paved patio.....just bliss as it overlooks the big backyard. Three bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, remaining two have robes, central bathroom , separate toilet and laundry. Features include two split systems, gas heater, fans, pantry , dishwasher, extra large linen and garden shed. Double garage with tendam to rear yard......easy to access. Light and bright with the lot , just add your touch to make this one home.

Description:
Modern, Spacious and Beautifully Appointed
The moment you step through the front gate, this property will captivate and entice.
The private front yard is a picture of lush greenery and shade, a space for outdoor play or just relaxing. Upon entering the home you are captivated by the open plan of this spacious well laid out property, boasting 4 upstairs bedrooms, modern bathroom, and ensuite to the main bedroom which opens up to an inviting undercover terrace, the spacious kitchen and living area also open up to the terrace where you can relax with a local wine or entertain your friends and enjoy the ships sailing up the bay, cafe blinds for the cooler evenings.
Downstairs is the 5th bedroom with an outlook to the private courtyard and separate private bathroom, this adjoins the enormous 4 car garage space where cars, boats and caravans can rest side by side, but then thereâ??s the separate carport, just in case you have more toys. This property, with its space, modern fixtures, large bedrooms, open plan living and beautiful features is nothing short of spectacular. Inspection is a must

Description:
LOOKING FOR A FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT
This well-established suburb has been growing and developing for over 40 years and many people still don't know it exists. A perfect time to buy while you can still get a lot of house for your money.
This home would make a great first home or an investment or even a project for the person who loves changing things.
Open spacious living, meals and kitchen has a nice welcoming feel. The bathroom has been updated, tick. Good size rear yard for the kids to run amuck or to keep the dog safe, tick.
This place may well be a hidden secret to most but for those of us who live here we really appreciate the amenities at our fingertips. Schools, shopping complexes, medical centres, rail trail for the riders, joggers and walkers, restaurants, cafes. Plus sporting clubs not to mention the boat ramp and the golf course. I enjoy living in this place. Why not come check it out.
Going to Auction March 3rd at 11am now's your chance to secure a property and in a few years time reap the rewards.

Description:
Corio bay views
Sweeping views of the water from the deck and sunroom. This recently renovated family home features timber floating floors, freshly painted throughout, new kitchen & bathrooms.
The large bay window with day bed creates a light filled separate formal lounge.
With a formal dining room looking out through the sunroom & the views.
The kitchen has been updated with plenty of draws, wall oven & breakfast bar.
The casual dining space is warmed by a gas log fire & access to the sunroom & deck.
Master bedroom with walk through robe & renovated ensuite. All bedrooms have ceiling fans.
The house is warmed by central heating, gas log fireplace & cooled by central evapourative cooling & fans.

Description:
The Priviledge Of Space, And Bay Views!
Situated in a prestigious location, this modern home has room for all the toys.
The 4-bed, 3-living room floorplan with bay views will appeal to families, whilst the privilege of space and great off street parking is ideal for a tradesman. Set on an 18 metre wide (approx.) landscaped block, boasting bay views and walking distance to schools and Drysdale Village, this one truly is a rare find!
-2 storey floorplan is zoned perfectly for entertaining and private family time
-Downstairs: front lounge/office, open plan family/meals/kitchen, alfresco, laundry and powder room and 6x6 double garage.
-Upstairs: large master suite, living zone, 3 further queen-sized BRs, bathroom and toilet
-Carpeted flooring throughout
-Well maintained fixtures and fittings
-Ducted heating to both levels ensures total comfort from the cold.
-What could be an office is ideally placed at the front for a home, or used as a second living.
-Huge alfresco entertaining is accessed via the meals area.
-The alfresco and rear yard is very private thanks to mature trees and shrubbery
-A small shed with attached kennel is located at the side for tools, storage or workshop.
-Large kitchen offers an abundance of cupboard and bench space for those that love to cook.
-Wall oven, pot drawers, pantry, and double fridges area and raised server make for a workable space.
-Indoor-outdoor atmosphere with access to the alfresco deck and backyard
-Laundry, powder room, linen and under-stair storage are convenient to the family area.
-Upstairs you enter into another living area to capture the bay views (future deck possible STCA)
-Built in linen cupboard and picture window to stairway.
-The master suite with bay-view balcony, WIR and Ensuite will surely please.
-3 queen sized bedrooms with built-in desks are accessed via the living area
-Large family bathroom with bath, shower and separate toilet
-Double full size 6x6 remote garage for with internal access for the cars
-Plus plenty of room for the boat and caravan, and full side access to yard- a luxury for any home!
-Set within a short walk of all family amenities, shopping and a choice of schools
-In the heart of The Bellarine, renowned for wineries, beaches and organic produce
This urban lifestyle property is sure to impress! Arrange an inspection today!
Insights: 34 Leonard Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Your own private resort with absolute beach frontage
This stunning property could be anywhere when you look at the photos. It is however located amongst quality homes on the blue ribbon coastal strip of Clifton Springs. The home is surrounded by beautiful gardens and is perfectly sited on this 3,626m2 (approx) parcel to provide privacy while taking advantage of the commanding views across the bay to the You Yangs. The architect designed home provides excellent accommodation and would respond well to further extension and renovation as required. Many will take the opportunity to enjoy the home in its current format with the view of building a purpose built home to their own requirements in the future.

Description:
A Real Surprise Package!!
Stop looking, this 3 bedroom family home on a 700m2 block is where the heart is. Formal lounge is L shaped with bay windows offering you the choice of gas heating or reverse cycle split system. The kitchen has a pantry, electric cook top with 2 electric wall ovens to make cooking for the family easy. 2nd living area is light filled & tiled which has sliding doors either end for great yard access. Master bedroom has everything you could wish for, a reverse cycle split system, ceiling fan, pool views, walk in robe & full ensuite featuring double shower. Bedroom 2 also has a ceiling reverse cycle unit. Both bedrooms 2 & 3 are spacious with built in robes plus great yard views. Central laundry, bathroom & separate toilet. Outside waiting for you to splash around in & enjoy is a 27,000 litre salt water & solar heated pool. Still plenty of secure yard for kids & pets to roam free. Plus another paved uncover area styled by a rock retaining wall with an abundance of green ferns & plants, perfect to sit & enjoy a cup of tea or read a book. A single car garage is powered & perfect for storage, games room or man cave. Plus double car garage at the front with electric roller doors. Walking distance to the beach, golf club & local shops! Also everything else Clifton Springs has to offer, public transport, local schools, new shops, medical facilities and the bay lifestyle.
Insights: 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Boutique Wyndham Rise
Wyndham Rise Estate is your opportunity to secure a block that is so different to the other estates available in the 3222 growth corridor. The estate has been deliberately created without a long list of restrictive covenants and with the opportunity to obtain views, this is an estate that allows you to build the home of YOUR dreams.
Call today to get more information.
